text: @KimKardashian Sorry @KimKardashian , but wasn’t that you who addressed the matter first amidst a pandemic on Twitter ?Why are you blaming her now, she rather asked people to donate and didn’t tag or abuse you. u’re such an abusive woman,grow up. What an example you’re setting for your kids lol
